trans-unit.source: Provides access to local and remote processes and enables you to start and stop local system processes.
trans-unit.target: Fornece acesso a processos locais e remotos e permite-lhe iniciar e parar processos do sistema local.

trans-unit.source: To browse the .NET Framework source code for this type, see the [Reference Source](http://referencesource.microsoft.com/#System/services/monitoring/system/diagnosticts/Process.cs#f8b2e604d6f1fe04).
trans-unit.target: Para procurar o código de origem do .NET Framework para este tipo, consulte o [referência origem](http://referencesource.microsoft.com/#System/services/monitoring/system/diagnosticts/Process.cs#f8b2e604d6f1fe04).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Diagnostics.Process"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Diagnostics.Process"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.MachineName%2A> property, the default is the local computer, (".").
trans-unit.target: Se não especificar o <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.MachineName%2A>propriedade, a predefinição é o computador local, (".").</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.MachineName%2A>

trans-unit.source: You have two options for associating a new <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> component with a process on the computer.
trans-unit.target: Tem duas opções para associar um novo <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>componente com um processo no computador.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>

trans-unit.source: The first option is to use the constructor to create the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> component, set the appropriate members of the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StartInfo%2A> property and call <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Start%2A> to associate the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> with a new system process.
trans-unit.target: A primeira opção consiste em utilizar o construtor para criar o <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>componente, definir os membros adequados a <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StartInfo%2A>propriedade e chamada <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Start%2A>para associar o <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>com um novo processo de sistema.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> </xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Start%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StartInfo%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>

trans-unit.source: The second option is to associate the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> with a running system process by using <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcessById%2A> or one of the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcesses%2A> return values.
trans-unit.target: É a segunda opção para associar o <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>com um processo em execução do sistema utilizando <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcessById%2A>ou um do <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcesses%2A>valores de retorno.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcesses%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcessById%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>

trans-unit.source: If you use a `static` overload of the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Start%2A> method to start a new system process, the method creates a new <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> component and associates it with the process.
trans-unit.target: Se utilizar um `static` sobrecarga do <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Start%2A>método para iniciar um novo processo de sistema, o método cria uma nova <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>componente e associa-a com o processo.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> </xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Start%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.UseShellExecute%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is set to its default value, `true`, you can start applications and documents in a way that is similar to using the `Run` dialog box of the Windows `Start` menu.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.UseShellExecute%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade está definida como valor predefinido, `true`, pode começar a aplicações e os documentos de forma semelhante à utilização de `Run` caixa de diálogo das janelas da `Start` menu.</xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.UseShellExecute%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.UseShellExecute%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is `false`, you can start only executables.
trans-unit.target: Quando <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.UseShellExecute%2A?displayProperty=fullName>é `false`, pode iniciar apenas executáveis.</xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.UseShellExecute%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Any executable file that you can call from the command line can be started in one of two ways: by setting the appropriate members of the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StartInfo%2A> property and calling the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Start%2A> method with no parameters, or by passing the appropriate parameter to the `static`<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Start%2A> member.
trans-unit.target: Qualquer ficheiro executável que pode ligar a partir da linha de comando pode ser iniciado de duas maneiras: através da definição adequados membros do <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StartInfo%2A>propriedade e chamar a <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Start%2A>método sem parâmetros ou passando o parâmetro adequado para o `static` <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Start%2A>Membro.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Start%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Start%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StartInfo%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can create a <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> component by using the constructor, one of the static <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Start%2A> overloads, or any of the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcessById%2A>, <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcesses%2A>, or <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcessesByName%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Pode criar um <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>componente utilizando o construtor, uma da estática <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Start%2A>sobrecargas ou qualquer uma do <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcessById%2A>, <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcesses%2A>, ou <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcessesByName%2A>métodos.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcessesByName%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcesses%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcessById%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Start%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>

trans-unit.source: After you have done so, you have a view into the associated process.
trans-unit.target: Depois de o ter feito, tem uma vista para o processo associado.

trans-unit.source: This is not a dynamic view that updates itself automatically when the process properties have changed in memory.
trans-unit.target: Não se trata de uma Vista dinâmica que atualiza-se automaticamente quando as propriedades de processo foram alterados na memória.

trans-unit.source: Instead, you must call <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Refresh%2A> for the component to update the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> property information in your application.
trans-unit.target: Em vez disso, tem de chamar <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Refresh%2A>para o componente a atualizar o <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>informações de propriedade na sua aplicação.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> </xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Refresh%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets the base priority of the associated process.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a prioridade base do processo associado.

trans-unit.source: The BasePriority of the process is the starting priority for threads created within the associated process.
trans-unit.target: BasePriority do processo é a prioridade inicial de threads criados dentro do processo associado.

trans-unit.source: You can view information about the base priority through the System Monitor's Priority Base counter.
trans-unit.target: Pode ver informações sobre a prioridade base através do Monitor de sistema prioridade Base contador.

trans-unit.source: Based on the time elapsed or other boosts, the operating system can change the base priority when a process should be placed ahead of others.
trans-unit.target: Baseia-se na hora boosts decorridos ou outros, o sistema operativo podem alterar a prioridade base quando um processo deve ser colocado à frente das outras pessoas.

trans-unit.source: The BasePriority property lets you view the starting priority assigned to a process.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade BasePriority permite-lhe ver a prioridade inicial atribuída a um processo.

trans-unit.source: However, because it is read-only, you cannot use the BasePriority to set the priority of the process.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, porque é só de leitura, não é possível utilizar o BasePriority para definir a prioridade do processo.

trans-unit.source: To change the priority, use the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.PriorityClass%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para alterar a prioridade, utilize o <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.PriorityClass%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.PriorityClass%2A>

trans-unit.source: The BasePriority is viewable using the System Monitor, while the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.PriorityClass%2A> is not.
trans-unit.target: O BasePriority é visualizável utilizando o Monitor de sistema, enquanto o <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.PriorityClass%2A>não é.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.PriorityClass%2A>

trans-unit.source: Both the BasePriority and the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.PriorityClass%2A> can be viewed programmatically.
trans-unit.target: Tanto o BasePriority e <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.PriorityClass%2A>podem ser visualizados através de programação.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.PriorityClass%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the relationship between BasePriority values and <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.PriorityClass%2A> values.
trans-unit.target: A tabela seguinte mostra a relação entre os valores de BasePriority e <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.PriorityClass%2A>valores.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.PriorityClass%2A>

trans-unit.source: |BasePriority|PriorityClass| |------------------|-------------------| |4|<xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessPriorityClass>| |8|<xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessPriorityClass>| |13|<xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessPriorityClass>| |24|<xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessPriorityClass>|
trans-unit.target: | BasePriority | PriorityClass | |------------------|-------------------| |&4; | <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessPriorityClass>| |&8; | <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessPriorityClass>| |&13; | <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessPriorityClass>| |&24; | <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessPriorityClass>|</xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessPriorityClass></xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessPriorityClass></xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessPriorityClass></xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessPriorityClass>

trans-unit.source: The base priority, which is computed from the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.PriorityClass*> of the associated process.
trans-unit.target: A prioridade base, o que é calculada a partir de <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.PriorityClass*>do processo associado.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.PriorityClass*>

trans-unit.source: The platform is Windows 98 or Windows Millennium Edition (Windows Me); set the <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.UseShellExecute%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to access this property on Windows 98 and Windows Me.
trans-unit.target: A plataforma é Windows 98 ou Windows Millennium edição (Windows-Me); definir o <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.UseShellExecute%2A?displayProperty=fullName> propriedade <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> para aceder a esta propriedade em 98 do Windows e Windows Me.

trans-unit.source: The process has exited.
trans-unit.target: O processo foi terminado.

trans-unit.source: -or- The process has not started, so there is no process ID.
trans-unit.target: - ou - o processo não foi iniciada, pelo que não existe nenhum ID de processo.

trans-unit.source: Begins asynchronous read operations on the redirected <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError*> stream of the application.
trans-unit.target: Começa operações de leitura assíncrona no redirecionada <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError*>fluxo da aplicação.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A> stream can be read synchronously or asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A>fluxo pode ser lidos de forma síncrona ou assíncrona.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A>

trans-unit.source: Methods such as <xref:System.IO.StreamReader.Read%2A>, <xref:System.IO.StreamReader.ReadLine%2A>, and <xref:System.IO.StreamReader.ReadToEnd%2A> perform synchronous read operations on the error output stream of the process.
trans-unit.target: Métodos, tais como <xref:System.IO.StreamReader.Read%2A>, <xref:System.IO.StreamReader.ReadLine%2A>, e <xref:System.IO.StreamReader.ReadToEnd%2A>efetuar operações de leitura síncronas no fluxo de saída de erro do processo.</xref:System.IO.StreamReader.ReadToEnd%2A> </xref:System.IO.StreamReader.ReadLine%2A> </xref:System.IO.StreamReader.Read%2A>

trans-unit.source: These synchronous read operations do not complete until the associated <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> writes to its <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A> stream, or closes the stream.
trans-unit.target: Estes síncrona ler operações não concluída até associada <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>escreve o <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A>transmitir ou fecha o fluxo.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>

trans-unit.source: In contrast, BeginErrorReadLine starts asynchronous read operations on the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A> stream.
trans-unit.target: Em contrapartida, inicia BeginErrorReadLine assíncrona operações de leitura no <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A>stream.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method enables the designated event handler for the stream output and immediately returns to the caller, which can perform other work while the stream output is directed to the event handler.
trans-unit.target: Este método permite que o processador de eventos designado para a saída de fluxo e devolve imediatamente para o emissor, o que pode efetuar outras tarefas enquanto a saída de fluxo é direcionada para o processador de eventos.

trans-unit.source: Follow these steps to perform asynchronous read operations on <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A> for a <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> : 1.
trans-unit.target: Siga estes passos para efetuar operações de leitura assíncrona no <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A>para um <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>: 1.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> </xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A>

trans-unit.source: Set <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.UseShellExecute%2A> to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Set <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.UseShellExecute%2A> to `false`.</xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.UseShellExecute%2A>

trans-unit.source: Set <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.RedirectStandardError%2A> to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Set <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.RedirectStandardError%2A> to `true`.</xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.RedirectStandardError%2A>

trans-unit.source: Add your event handler to the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.ErrorDataReceived> event.
trans-unit.target: Adicionar o processador de eventos para o <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.ErrorDataReceived>eventos.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.ErrorDataReceived>

trans-unit.source: The event handler must match the <xref:System.Diagnostics.DataReceivedEventHandler?displayProperty=fullName> delegate signature.
trans-unit.target: O processador de eventos tem de corresponder a <xref:System.Diagnostics.DataReceivedEventHandler?displayProperty=fullName>assinatura delegado.</xref:System.Diagnostics.DataReceivedEventHandler?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Start the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>.
trans-unit.target: Iniciar <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>

trans-unit.source: Call BeginErrorReadLine for the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>.
trans-unit.target: Chamada BeginErrorReadLine para <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>

trans-unit.source: This call starts asynchronous read operations on <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Esta chamada inicia operações de leitura assíncrona no <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A>.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A>

trans-unit.source: When asynchronous read operations start, the event handler is called each time the associated <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> writes a line of text to its <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A> stream.
trans-unit.target: Quando é chamado o início de operações de leitura assíncrona, o processador de eventos de cada vez associada <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>escreve uma linha de texto ao respetivo <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A>stream.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>

trans-unit.source: You can cancel an asynchronous read operation by calling <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.CancelErrorRead%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Pode cancelar uma operação de leitura assíncrona chamando <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.CancelErrorRead%2A>.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.CancelErrorRead%2A>

trans-unit.source: The read operation can be canceled by the caller or by the event handler.
trans-unit.target: A operação de leitura pode ser cancelada pelo chamador ou pelo processador de eventos.

trans-unit.source: After canceling, you can call BeginErrorReadLine again to resume asynchronous read operations.
trans-unit.target: Após Cancelar, pode chamar BeginErrorReadLine novamente para retomar as operações de leitura assíncrona.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You cannot mix asynchronous and synchronous read operations on a redirected stream.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Não é possível misturar assíncronas e síncronas as operações de leitura numa sequência redirecionado.

trans-unit.source: Once the redirected stream of a <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> is opened in either asynchronous or synchronous mode, all further read operations on that stream must be in the same mode.
trans-unit.target: Uma vez a transmissão de redirecionada um <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>é aberto no modo assíncrono ou síncrono, todas mais leitura operações nesse fluxo tem de ser o mesmo modo.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>

trans-unit.source: For example, do not follow BeginErrorReadLine with a call to <xref:System.IO.StreamReader.ReadLine%2A> on the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A> stream, or vice versa.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, não siga BeginErrorReadLine através de uma chamada para <xref:System.IO.StreamReader.ReadLine%2A>no <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A>stream, ou vice versa.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A> </xref:System.IO.StreamReader.ReadLine%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, you can read two different streams in different modes.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, pode ler dois fluxos diferentes em modos diferentes.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can call BeginErrorReadLine and then call <xref:System.IO.StreamReader.ReadLine%2A> for the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A> stream.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, pode chamar BeginErrorReadLine e, em seguida, chame <xref:System.IO.StreamReader.ReadLine%2A>para o <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A>stream.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A> </xref:System.IO.StreamReader.ReadLine%2A>

trans-unit.source: Begins asynchronous read operations on the redirected <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput*> stream of the application.
trans-unit.target: Começa operações de leitura assíncrona no redirecionada <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput*>fluxo da aplicação.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A> stream can be read synchronously or asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A>fluxo pode ser lidos de forma síncrona ou assíncrona.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A>

trans-unit.source: Methods such as <xref:System.IO.StreamReader.Read%2A>, <xref:System.IO.StreamReader.ReadLine%2A>, and <xref:System.IO.StreamReader.ReadToEnd%2A> perform synchronous read operations on the output stream of the process.
trans-unit.target: Métodos, tais como <xref:System.IO.StreamReader.Read%2A>, <xref:System.IO.StreamReader.ReadLine%2A>, e <xref:System.IO.StreamReader.ReadToEnd%2A>efetuar operações de leitura síncronas no fluxo de saída do processo.</xref:System.IO.StreamReader.ReadToEnd%2A> </xref:System.IO.StreamReader.ReadLine%2A> </xref:System.IO.StreamReader.Read%2A>

trans-unit.source: These synchronous read operations do not complete until the associated <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> writes to its <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A> stream, or closes the stream.
trans-unit.target: Estes síncrona ler operações não concluída até associada <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>escreve o <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A>transmitir ou fecha o fluxo.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>

trans-unit.source: In contrast, BeginOutputReadLine starts asynchronous read operations on the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A> stream.
trans-unit.target: Em contrapartida, inicia BeginOutputReadLine assíncrona operações de leitura no <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A>stream.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method enables a designated event handler for the stream output and immediately returns to the caller, which can perform other work while the stream output is directed to the event handler.
trans-unit.target: Este método permite que um processador de eventos designado para a saída de fluxo e devolve imediatamente para o emissor, o que pode efetuar outras tarefas enquanto a saída de fluxo é direcionada para o processador de eventos.

trans-unit.source: Follow these steps to perform asynchronous read operations on <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A> for a <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> : 1.
trans-unit.target: Siga estes passos para efetuar operações de leitura assíncrona no <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A>para um <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>: 1.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> </xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A>

trans-unit.source: Set <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.UseShellExecute%2A> to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Set <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.UseShellExecute%2A> to `false`.</xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.UseShellExecute%2A>

trans-unit.source: Set <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.RedirectStandardOutput%2A> to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Set <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.RedirectStandardOutput%2A> to `true`.</xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.RedirectStandardOutput%2A>

trans-unit.source: Add your event handler to the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.OutputDataReceived> event.
trans-unit.target: Adicionar o processador de eventos para o <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.OutputDataReceived>eventos.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.OutputDataReceived>

trans-unit.source: The event handler must match the <xref:System.Diagnostics.DataReceivedEventHandler?displayProperty=fullName> delegate signature.
trans-unit.target: O processador de eventos tem de corresponder a <xref:System.Diagnostics.DataReceivedEventHandler?displayProperty=fullName>assinatura delegado.</xref:System.Diagnostics.DataReceivedEventHandler?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Start the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>.
trans-unit.target: Iniciar <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>

trans-unit.source: Call BeginOutputReadLine for the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>.
trans-unit.target: Chamada BeginOutputReadLine para <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>

trans-unit.source: This call starts asynchronous read operations on <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Esta chamada inicia operações de leitura assíncrona no <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A>.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A>

trans-unit.source: When asynchronous read operations start, the event handler is called each time the associated <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> writes a line of text to its <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A> stream.
trans-unit.target: Quando é chamado o início de operações de leitura assíncrona, o processador de eventos de cada vez associada <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>escreve uma linha de texto ao respetivo <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A>stream.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>

trans-unit.source: You can cancel an asynchronous read operation by calling <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.CancelOutputRead%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Pode cancelar uma operação de leitura assíncrona chamando <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.CancelOutputRead%2A>.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.CancelOutputRead%2A>

trans-unit.source: The read operation can be canceled by the caller or by the event handler.
trans-unit.target: A operação de leitura pode ser cancelada pelo chamador ou pelo processador de eventos.

trans-unit.source: After canceling, you can call BeginOutputReadLine again to resume asynchronous read operations.
trans-unit.target: Após Cancelar, pode chamar BeginOutputReadLine novamente para retomar as operações de leitura assíncrona.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You cannot mix asynchronous and synchronous read operations on a redirected stream.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Não é possível misturar assíncronas e síncronas as operações de leitura numa sequência redirecionado.

trans-unit.source: Once the redirected stream of a <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> is opened in either asynchronous or synchronous mode, all further read operations on that stream must be in the same mode.
trans-unit.target: Uma vez a transmissão de redirecionada um <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>é aberto no modo assíncrono ou síncrono, todas mais leitura operações nesse fluxo tem de ser o mesmo modo.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>

trans-unit.source: For example, do not follow BeginOutputReadLine with a call to <xref:System.IO.StreamReader.ReadLine%2A> on the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A> stream, or vice versa.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, não siga BeginOutputReadLine com uma chamada para <xref:System.IO.StreamReader.ReadLine%2A>no <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A>stream, ou vice versa.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A> </xref:System.IO.StreamReader.ReadLine%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, you can read two different streams in different modes.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, pode ler dois fluxos diferentes em modos diferentes.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can call BeginOutputReadLine and then call <xref:System.IO.StreamReader.ReadLine%2A> for the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A> stream.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, pode chamar BeginOutputReadLine e, em seguida, chame <xref:System.IO.StreamReader.ReadLine%2A>para o <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A>stream.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A> </xref:System.IO.StreamReader.ReadLine%2A>

trans-unit.source: Cancels the asynchronous read operation on the redirected <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError*> stream of an application.
trans-unit.target: Cancela a assíncrona operação de leitura no redirecionada <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError*>transmissão de uma aplicação.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError*>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.BeginErrorReadLine%2A> starts an asynchronous read operation on the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A> stream.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.BeginErrorReadLine%2A>inicia um assíncrona operação de leitura no <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A>stream.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A></xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.BeginErrorReadLine%2A>

trans-unit.source: CancelErrorRead ends the asynchronous read operation.
trans-unit.target: CancelErrorRead termina a operação de leitura assíncrona.

trans-unit.source: After canceling, you can resume the asynchronous read operation by calling <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.BeginErrorReadLine%2A> again.
trans-unit.target: Após Cancelar, pode retomar a operação de leitura assíncrona chamando <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.BeginErrorReadLine%2A>novamente.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.BeginErrorReadLine%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you call CancelErrorRead, all in-progress read operations for <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A> are completed and then the event handler is disabled.
trans-unit.target: Quando chamar CancelErrorRead, todos os em curso operações de leitura de para <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A>estão concluídas e, em seguida, o processador de eventos está desativado.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A>

trans-unit.source: All further redirected output to <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A> is saved in a buffer.
trans-unit.target: Todos os redirecionado ainda mais o resultado para <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A>é guardado numa memória intermédia.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you re-enable the event handler with a call to <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.BeginErrorReadLine%2A>, the saved output is sent to the event handler and asynchronous read operations resume.
trans-unit.target: Se voltar a ativar o processador de eventos com uma chamada para <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.BeginErrorReadLine%2A>, a saída guardada é enviada para o processador de eventos e retomar as operações de leitura assíncronas.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.BeginErrorReadLine%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you want to change the event handler before resuming asynchronous read operations, you must remove the existing event handler before adding the new event handler: ``` // At this point the DataReceivedEventHandler(ErrorHandler1) // has executed a CancelErrorRead. // Remove the prior event handler. process.ErrorDataReceived -= new DataReceivedEventHandler(ErrorHandler1); // Register a new event handler. process.ErrorDataReceived += new DataReceivedEventHandler(ErrorHandler2); // Call the corresponding BeginErrorReadLine. process.BeginErrorReadLine(); ``` > [!NOTE] > You cannot mix asynchronous and synchronous read operations on the redirected <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A> stream.
trans-unit.target: Se pretender alterar o processador de eventos antes de a retomar as operações de leitura assíncronas, tem de remover o processador de eventos existente antes de adicionar o processador de eventos novos: ``` // At this point the DataReceivedEventHandler(ErrorHandler1) // has executed a CancelErrorRead. // Remove the prior event handler. process.ErrorDataReceived -= new DataReceivedEventHandler(ErrorHandler1); // Register a new event handler. process.ErrorDataReceived += new DataReceivedEventHandler(ErrorHandler2); // Call the corresponding BeginErrorReadLine. process.BeginErrorReadLine(); ``` > [!NOTE] > não é possível misturar assíncronas e síncronas as operações de leitura no redirecionada <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A>stream.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A>

trans-unit.source: Once the redirected stream of a <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> is opened in either asynchronous or synchronous mode, all further read operations on that stream must be in the same mode.
trans-unit.target: Uma vez a transmissão de redirecionada um <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>é aberto no modo assíncrono ou síncrono, todas mais leitura operações nesse fluxo tem de ser o mesmo modo.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>

trans-unit.source: If you cancel an asynchronous read operation on <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A> and then need to read from the stream again, you must use <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.BeginErrorReadLine%2A> to resume asynchronous read operations.
trans-unit.target: Se cancelar uma assíncrona operação de leitura no <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A>e, em seguida, precisa de ler a partir do fluxo de novamente, tem de utilizar <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.BeginErrorReadLine%2A>para retomar as operações de leitura assíncrona.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.BeginErrorReadLine%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A>

trans-unit.source: Do not follow CancelErrorRead with a call to the synchronous read methods of <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A> such as <xref:System.IO.StreamReader.Read%2A>, <xref:System.IO.StreamReader.ReadLine%2A>, or <xref:System.IO.StreamReader.ReadToEnd%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Não siga CancelErrorRead com uma chamada para os métodos síncronos de leitura de <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A>como <xref:System.IO.StreamReader.Read%2A>, <xref:System.IO.StreamReader.ReadLine%2A>, ou <xref:System.IO.StreamReader.ReadToEnd%2A>.</xref:System.IO.StreamReader.ReadToEnd%2A> </xref:System.IO.StreamReader.ReadLine%2A> </xref:System.IO.StreamReader.Read%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError*> stream is not enabled for asynchronous read operations.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError*>sequência não está ativada para operações de leitura assíncrona.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError*>

trans-unit.source: Cancels the asynchronous read operation on the redirected <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput*> stream of an application.
trans-unit.target: Cancela a assíncrona operação de leitura no redirecionada <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput*>transmissão de uma aplicação.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput*>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.BeginOutputReadLine%2A> starts an asynchronous read operation on the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A> stream.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.BeginOutputReadLine%2A>inicia um assíncrona operação de leitura no <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A>stream.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A></xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.BeginOutputReadLine%2A>

trans-unit.source: CancelOutputRead ends the asynchronous read operation.
trans-unit.target: CancelOutputRead termina a operação de leitura assíncrona.

trans-unit.source: After canceling, you can resume asynchronous read operations by calling <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.BeginOutputReadLine%2A> again.
trans-unit.target: Após Cancelar, pode retomar as operações de leitura assíncronas chamando <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.BeginOutputReadLine%2A>novamente.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.BeginOutputReadLine%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you call CancelOutputRead, all in-progress read operations for <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A> are completed and then the event handler is disabled.
trans-unit.target: Quando chamar CancelOutputRead, todos os em curso operações de leitura de para <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A>estão concluídas e, em seguida, o processador de eventos está desativado.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A>

trans-unit.source: All further redirected output to <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A> is saved in a buffer.
trans-unit.target: Todos os redirecionado ainda mais o resultado para <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A>é guardado numa memória intermédia.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you re-enable the event handler with a call to <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.BeginOutputReadLine%2A>, the saved output is sent to the event handler and asynchronous read operations resume.
trans-unit.target: Se voltar a ativar o processador de eventos com uma chamada para <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.BeginOutputReadLine%2A>, a saída guardada é enviada para o processador de eventos e retomar as operações de leitura assíncronas.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.BeginOutputReadLine%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you want to change the event handler before resuming asynchronous read operations, you must remove the existing event handler before adding the new event handler: ``` // At this point the DataReceivedEventHandler(OutputHandler1) // has executed a CancelOutputRead. // Remove the prior event handler. process.OutputDataReceived -= new DataReceivedEventHandler(OutputHandler1); // Register a new event handler. process.OutputDataReceived += new DataReceivedEventHandler(OutputHandler2); // Call the corresponding BeginOutputReadLine. process.BeginOutputReadLine(); ``` > [!NOTE] > You cannot mix asynchronous and synchronous read operations on the redirected <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A> stream.
trans-unit.target: Se pretender alterar o processador de eventos antes de a retomar as operações de leitura assíncronas, tem de remover o processador de eventos existente antes de adicionar o processador de eventos novos: ``` // At this point the DataReceivedEventHandler(OutputHandler1) // has executed a CancelOutputRead. // Remove the prior event handler. process.OutputDataReceived -= new DataReceivedEventHandler(OutputHandler1); // Register a new event handler. process.OutputDataReceived += new DataReceivedEventHandler(OutputHandler2); // Call the corresponding BeginOutputReadLine. process.BeginOutputReadLine(); ``` > [!NOTE] > não é possível misturar assíncronas e síncronas as operações de leitura no redirecionada <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A>stream.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A>

trans-unit.source: Once the redirected stream of a <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> is opened in either asynchronous or synchronous mode, all further read operations on that stream must be in the same mode.
trans-unit.target: Uma vez a transmissão de redirecionada um <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>é aberto no modo assíncrono ou síncrono, todas mais leitura operações nesse fluxo tem de ser o mesmo modo.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>

trans-unit.source: If you cancel an asynchronous read operation on <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A> and then need to read from the stream again, you must use <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.BeginOutputReadLine%2A> to resume asynchronous read operations.
trans-unit.target: Se cancelar uma assíncrona operação de leitura no <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A>e, em seguida, precisa de ler a partir do fluxo de novamente, tem de utilizar <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.BeginOutputReadLine%2A>para retomar as operações de leitura assíncrona.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.BeginOutputReadLine%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A>

trans-unit.source: Do not follow CancelOutputRead with a call to the synchronous read methods of <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A> such as <xref:System.IO.StreamReader.Read%2A>, <xref:System.IO.StreamReader.ReadLine%2A>, or <xref:System.IO.StreamReader.ReadToEnd%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Não siga CancelOutputRead com uma chamada para os métodos síncronos de leitura de <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A>como <xref:System.IO.StreamReader.Read%2A>, <xref:System.IO.StreamReader.ReadLine%2A>, ou <xref:System.IO.StreamReader.ReadToEnd%2A>.</xref:System.IO.StreamReader.ReadToEnd%2A> </xref:System.IO.StreamReader.ReadLine%2A> </xref:System.IO.StreamReader.Read%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput*> stream is not enabled for asynchronous read operations.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput*>sequência não está ativada para operações de leitura assíncrona.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardOutput*>

trans-unit.source: Frees all the resources that are associated with this component.
trans-unit.target: Liberta os recursos que estão associados este componente.

trans-unit.source: The Close method causes the process to stop waiting for exit if it was waiting, closes the process handle, and clears process-specific properties.
trans-unit.target: O método Fechar faz com que o processo parar a aguardar a saída se estava a aguardar, fecha o identificador de processo e limpa propriedades específicos de processos.

trans-unit.source: Close does not close the standard output, input, and error readers and writers in case they are being referenced externally.
trans-unit.target: Feche não fechar a leitores de erro, de entrada e de saída standard escritores caso estão a ser referenciados externamente.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Dispose%2A> method calls Close.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > O <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Dispose%2A>chama o método de fecho.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: Placing the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> object in a `using` block disposes of resources without the need to call Close.
trans-unit.target: Colocar o <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>objeto um `using` bloco disposes dos recursos sem a necessidade de chamar feche.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>

trans-unit.source: Closes a process that has a user interface by sending a close message to its main window.
trans-unit.target: Fecha um processo que tem uma interface de utilizador enviando uma mensagem de fecho para a janela principal.

trans-unit.source: When a process is executing, its message loop is in a wait state.
trans-unit.target: Quando um processo está a executar, o respetivo ciclo de mensagens está num Estado de espera.

trans-unit.source: The message loop executes every time a Windows message is sent to the process by the operating system.
trans-unit.target: O ciclo de mensagem executa sempre que é enviada uma mensagem do Windows para o processo pelo sistema operativo.

trans-unit.source: Calling CloseMainWindow sends a request to close to the main window, which, in a well-formed application, closes child windows and revokes all running message loops for the application.
trans-unit.target: Chamar CloseMainWindow envia um pedido para a próximo da janela principal, que, numa aplicação formada, fecha janelas subordinadas e revoga execução todos os ciclos de mensagem para a aplicação.

trans-unit.source: The request to exit the process by calling CloseMainWindow does not force the application to quit.
trans-unit.target: O pedido para sair do processo ao chamar CloseMainWindow não forçar a aplicação para sair.

trans-unit.source: The application can ask for user verification before quitting, or it can refuse to quit.
trans-unit.target: A aplicação pode fazer para a verificação do utilizador antes de quitting ou pode refuse sair.

trans-unit.source: To force the application to quit, use the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Kill%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para forçar a aplicação para sair, utilize o <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Kill%2A>método.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Kill%2A>

trans-unit.source: The behavior of CloseMainWindow is identical to that of a user closing an application's main window using the system menu.
trans-unit.target: O comportamento de CloseMainWindow é idêntico ao de um utilizador a fechar a janela principal de uma aplicação utilizando o menu de sistema.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the request to exit the process by closing the main window does not force the application to quit immediately.
trans-unit.target: Por conseguinte, o pedido para sair do processo ao fechar a janela principal não forçar a aplicação para sair imediatamente.

trans-unit.source: Data edited by the process or resources allocated to the process can be lost if you call <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Kill%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Editado pelo processo de dados ou recursos atribuídos ao processo podem ser perdidos se chamar <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Kill%2A>.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Kill%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Kill%2A> causes an abnormal process termination, and should be used only when necessary.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Kill%2A>faz com que um encerramento do processo anormal e deve ser utilizado apenas quando necessário.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Kill%2A>

trans-unit.source: CloseMainWindow enables an orderly termination of the process and closes all windows, so it is preferable for applications with an interface.
trans-unit.target: CloseMainWindow permite a um encerramento do processo de ordenada e fecha todos os windows, pelo que é preferível para as aplicações com uma interface.

trans-unit.source: If CloseMainWindow fails, you can use <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Kill%2A> to terminate the process.
trans-unit.target: Se CloseMainWindow falhar, pode utilizar <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Kill%2A>terminar o processo.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Kill%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Kill%2A> is the only way to terminate processes that do not have graphical interfaces.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Kill%2A>é a única forma de terminar os processos que não dispõe de interfaces gráficas.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Kill%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can call <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Kill%2A> and CloseMainWindow only for processes that are running on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: Pode chamar <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Kill%2A>e CloseMainWindow apenas para processos em execução no computador local.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Kill%2A>

trans-unit.source: You cannot cause processes on remote computers to exit.
trans-unit.target: Não é possível fazer com que os processos em computadores remotos para sair.

trans-unit.source: You can only view information for processes running on remote computers.
trans-unit.target: Só pode ver informações de processos em execução em computadores remotos.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the close message was successfully sent; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the associated process does not have a main window or if the main window is disabled (for example if a modal dialog is being shown).
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a mensagem de fecho foi enviada com êxito; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> se o processo associado não possui uma janela principal ou se a janela principal está desativada (por exemplo, se estiver a ser mostrada uma caixa de diálogo modal).

trans-unit.source: The platform is Windows 98 or Windows Millennium Edition (Windows Me); set the <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.UseShellExecute%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to access this property on Windows 98 and Windows Me.
trans-unit.target: A plataforma é Windows 98 ou Windows Millennium edição (Windows-Me); definir o <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo.UseShellExecute%2A?displayProperty=fullName> propriedade <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> para aceder a esta propriedade em 98 do Windows e Windows Me.

trans-unit.source: The process has already exited.
trans-unit.target: O processo já terminou.

trans-unit.source: -or- No process is associated with this <xref href="System.Diagnostics.Process"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: - ou - nenhum processo está associado a este <xref href="System.Diagnostics.Process"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Release all resources used by this process.
trans-unit.target: Liberte todos os recursos utilizados por este processo.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Para libertar recursos geridos e; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> para libertar recursos apenas não geridos.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether the <xref href="System.Diagnostics.Process.Exited"></xref> event should be raised when the process terminates.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define se a <xref href="System.Diagnostics.Process.Exited"> </xref> o evento deve ser gerado quando o processo termina.

trans-unit.source: The EnableRaisingEvents property indicates whether the component should be notified when the operating system has shut down a process.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade EnableRaisingEvents indica se o componente deve ser notificado quando o sistema operativo foi encerrado por um processo.

trans-unit.source: The EnableRaisingEvents property is used in asynchronous processing to notify your application that a process has exited.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade EnableRaisingEvents é utilizada no processamento assíncrono para notificar a aplicação que um processo foi terminado.

trans-unit.source: To force your application to synchronously wait for an exit event (which interrupts processing of the application until the exit event has occurred), use the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.WaitForExit%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para forçar a aplicação de forma síncrona aguardar por um evento de saída (que interrupções processamento da aplicação até que ocorreu o evento de saída), utilize o <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.WaitForExit%2A>método.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.WaitForExit%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If you are using Visual Studio and double-click a <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> component in your project, an <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Exited> event delegate and event handler are automatically generated.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Se estiver a utilizar o Visual Studio e faça duplo clique num <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>componente no seu projeto, um <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Exited>delegado de evento e o processador de eventos que são geradas automaticamente.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Exited> </xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>

trans-unit.source: Additional code sets the EnableRaisingEvents property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Código adicional define a propriedade de EnableRaisingEvents como `false`.

trans-unit.source: You must change this property to `true` for your event handler to be executed when the associated process exits.
trans-unit.target: Tem de alterar esta propriedade para `true` para o processador de eventos ser executada quando o processo associado termina.

trans-unit.source: When an associated process exits after being shut down by the operating system either through a normal or abnormal termination, the operating system notifies each process component to which the process was associated, as long as the component's EnableRaisingEvents value is `true`.
trans-unit.target: Quando um processo associado termina após a ser encerrado pelo sistema operativo, quer através de terminação anormal ou normal, o sistema operativo notifica cada componente do processo para o qual o processo foi associado, desde que o valor de EnableRaisingEvents o componente é `true`.

trans-unit.source: If a component started the process, the component can then access the administrative information for the associated process, which is still being stored by the operating system.
trans-unit.target: Se um componente iniciado o processo, o componente, em seguida, pode aceder as informações administrativas para o processo associado, que ainda está a ser armazenado pelo sistema operativo.

trans-unit.source: Such information includes the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.ExitTime%2A>, and the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.ExitCode%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Estas informações incluem o <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.ExitTime%2A>e <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.ExitCode%2A>.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.ExitCode%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.ExitTime%2A>

trans-unit.source: After the associated process exits, the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Handle%2A> of the component no longer points to an existing process resource.
trans-unit.target: Depois do processo associado termina, o <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Handle%2A>do componente já não aponta para um recurso de processo existente.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Handle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Instead, it can be used only to access the operating system's information about the process resource.
trans-unit.target: Em vez disso, pode ser utilizado apenas para aceder às informações do sistema operativo sobre o recurso de processo.

trans-unit.source: The operating system is aware that there are handles to exited processes that have not been released by <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> components, so it keeps the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.ExitTime%2A> and <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Handle%2A> information in memory.
trans-unit.target: O sistema operativo está ciente de que existem identificadores fechadas processos que não tenham sido publicadas por <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>componentes, pelo que mantém o <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.ExitTime%2A>e <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Handle%2A>informações na memória.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Handle%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.ExitTime%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>

trans-unit.source: There is a cost associated with watching for a process to exit.
trans-unit.target: Não há um custo associado observar um processo sair.

trans-unit.source: If EnableRaisingEvents is `true`, the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Exited> event is raised when the associated process terminates.
trans-unit.target: Se for EnableRaisingEvents `true`, a <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Exited>evento é gerado quando o processo associado termina.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Exited>

trans-unit.source: The procedures that you have specified for the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Exited> event run at that time.
trans-unit.target: Os procedimentos que tenha especificado para o <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Exited>eventos executados a essa hora.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Exited>

trans-unit.source: Sometimes, your application starts a process but does not need to be notified of its closure.
trans-unit.target: Por vezes, a aplicação inicia um processo, mas não tem de ser notificados o fecho.

trans-unit.source: For example, your application can start Notepad to allow the user to perform text editing, but make no further use of the Notepad application.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, a aplicação pode iniciar o bloco de notas para permitir ao utilizador efetuar a edição de texto, mas não são necessárias mais tornar utilização da aplicação de bloco de notas.

trans-unit.source: You can choose to not be notified when the process exits, because it is not relevant to the continued operation of your application.
trans-unit.target: Pode optar por não ser notificado quando o processo sai, porque não é relevante para a operação contínua da aplicação.

trans-unit.source: Setting EnableRaisingEvents to `false` saves system resources.
trans-unit.target: Definição EnableRaisingEvents `false` guarda os recursos do sistema.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Diagnostics.Process.Exited"></xref> event should be raised when the associated process is terminated (through either an exit or a call to <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Kill*>); otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref href="System.Diagnostics.Process.Exited"> </xref> o evento deve ser gerado quando o processo associado foi terminado (através de uma saída ou de uma chamada para <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Kill*>); caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Kill*>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Puts a <xref href="System.Diagnostics.Process"></xref> component in state to interact with operating system processes that run in a special mode by enabling the native property <xref uid="langword_csharp_SeDebugPrivilege" name="SeDebugPrivilege" href=""></xref> on the current thread.
trans-unit.target: Coloca um <xref href="System.Diagnostics.Process"> </xref> componente no Estado a interagir com o sistema operativo processos que são executados num modo especial, Ativando a propriedade nativa <xref uid="langword_csharp_SeDebugPrivilege" name="SeDebugPrivilege" href=""> </xref> no thread atual.

trans-unit.source: Some operating system processes run in a special mode.
trans-unit.target: Alguns processos de sistema operativo executam num modo especial.

trans-unit.source: Attempting to read properties of or attach to these processes is not possible unless you have called EnterDebugMode on the component.
trans-unit.target: A tentar ler as propriedades de ou ligar a estes processos não for possível, a menos que tenha chamado EnterDebugMode no componente.

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.LeaveDebugMode%2A> when you no longer need access to these processes that run in special mode.
trans-unit.target: Chamar <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.LeaveDebugMode%2A>quando já não necessita de acesso a estes processos que são executados num modo especial.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.LeaveDebugMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an application writes to its redirected <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError*> stream.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando uma aplicação escreve o redirecionada <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError*>stream.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError*>

trans-unit.source: The ErrorDataReceived event indicates that the associated process has written to its redirected <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A> stream.
trans-unit.target: O evento ErrorDataReceived indica que o processo associado escritos na respetiva redirecionada <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A>stream.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A>

trans-unit.source: The event only occurs during asynchronous read operations on <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A>.
trans-unit.target: O evento só ocorre durante as operações de leitura assíncronas no <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A>.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A>

trans-unit.source: To start asynchronous read operations, you must redirect the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A> stream of a <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>, add your event handler to the ErrorDataReceived event, and call <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.BeginErrorReadLine%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Para iniciar as operações de leitura assíncrona, tem de redirecionar o <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A>fluxo de um <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>, adicione o processador de eventos para o evento de ErrorDataReceived e chamar <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.BeginErrorReadLine%2A>.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.BeginErrorReadLine%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> </xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A>

trans-unit.source: Thereafter, the ErrorDataReceived event signals each time the process writes a line to the redirected <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A> stream, until the process exits or calls <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.CancelErrorRead%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Depois disso, sinais de evento ErrorDataReceived sempre que o processo escreve uma linha ao redirecionada <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A>stream, até que o processo é terminado ou chamadas <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.CancelErrorRead%2A>.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.CancelErrorRead%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.StandardError%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The application that is processing the asynchronous output should call the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.WaitForExit%2A> method to ensure that the output buffer has been flushed.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > A aplicação que está a processar o resultado assíncrono deverá chamar o <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.WaitForExit%2A>método para se certificar de que a memória intermédia de saída foram descarregada.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.WaitForExit%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets the value that the associated process specified when it terminated.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o valor que o processo associado especificado quando este termina.

trans-unit.source: Use ExitCode to get the status that the system process returned when it exited.
trans-unit.target: Utilize ExitCode para obter o estado de que o processo de sistema devolvido quando este foi terminado.

trans-unit.source: You can use the exit code much like an integer return value from a `main()` procedure.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar o código de saída muito como um número inteiro devolver valor de um `main()` procedimento.

trans-unit.source: The ExitCode value for a process reflects the specific convention implemented by the application developer for that process.
trans-unit.target: O valor de ExitCode para um processo reflete a convenção específica implementada pelo programador da aplicação para esse processo.

trans-unit.source: If you use the exit code value to make decisions in your code, be sure that you know the exit code convention used by the application process.
trans-unit.target: Se utilizar o valor do código de saída para tomar decisões no seu código, lembre-se de que conhece a Convenção de código de saída utilizada pelo processo de aplicação.

trans-unit.source: Developers usually indicate a successful exit by an ExitCode value of zero, and designate errors by nonzero values that the calling method can use to identify the cause of an abnormal process termination.
trans-unit.target: Os programadores normalmente indicam uma saída com êxito por um valor de ExitCode igual a zero e designar erros por valores diferentes de zero, que pode utilizar o método de chamada para identificar a causa de um encerramento do processo anormal.

trans-unit.source: It is not necessary to follow these guidelines, but they are the convention.
trans-unit.target: Não é necessário seguir estas diretrizes, mas estão a Convenção.

trans-unit.source: If you try to get the ExitCode before the process has exited, the attempt throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: Se tentar obter o ExitCode antes do processo foi terminado, a tentativa de emite uma exceção.

trans-unit.source: Examine the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.HasExited%2A> property first to verify whether the associated process has terminated.
trans-unit.target: Examine o <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.HasExited%2A>propriedade primeiro para verificar se o processo associado foi terminada.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.HasExited%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When standard output has been redirected to asynchronous event handlers, it is possible that output processing will not have completed when <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.HasExited%2A> returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Quando a saída padrão foi redirecionada para processadores de eventos assíncrona, é possível que o processamento de saída serão não ter sido concluída quando <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.HasExited%2A>devolve `true`.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.HasExited%2A>

trans-unit.source: To ensure that asynchronous event handling has been completed, call the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.WaitForExit> overload that takes no parameter before checking <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.HasExited%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Para garantir que o processamento de eventos assíncrona foi concluído, chame a <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.WaitForExit>sobrecarga que não assume nenhum parâmetro antes de a verificar <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.HasExited%2A>.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.HasExited%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.WaitForExit>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.CloseMainWindow%2A> or the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Kill%2A> method to cause an associated process to exit.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar o <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.CloseMainWindow%2A>ou <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Kill%2A>método para fazer com que um processo associado termina.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Kill%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.CloseMainWindow%2A>

trans-unit.source: There are two ways of being notified when the associated process exits: synchronously and asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: Existem duas formas de que está a ser notificado quando o processo associado termina: forma síncrona e assíncrona.

trans-unit.source: Synchronous notification relies on calling the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.WaitForExit%2A> method to pause the processing of your application until the associated component exits.
trans-unit.target: Notificação síncrona depende de chamar o <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.WaitForExit%2A>método para colocar em pausa o processamento da sua aplicação até que o componente associado sai.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.WaitForExit%2A>

trans-unit.source: Asynchronous notification relies on the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Exited> event.
trans-unit.target: Notificação assíncrona depende o <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Exited>eventos.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Exited>

trans-unit.source: When using asynchronous notification, <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.EnableRaisingEvents%2A> must be set to `true` for the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> component to receive notification that the process has exited.
trans-unit.target: Ao utilizar a notificação assíncrona, <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.EnableRaisingEvents%2A>deve ser definido como `true` para o <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>componente para receber a notificação a indicar que o processo foi terminado.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> </xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.EnableRaisingEvents%2A>

trans-unit.source: The code that the associated process specified when it terminated.
trans-unit.target: O código que o processo associado especificado quando este termina.

trans-unit.source: The process has not exited.
trans-unit.target: O processo não terminou.

trans-unit.source: -or- The process <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Handle*> is not valid.
trans-unit.target: - ou - o processo <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Handle*>não é válido.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Handle*>

trans-unit.source: You are trying to access the ExitCode property for a process that is running on a remote computer.
trans-unit.target: Está a tentar aceder a propriedade ExitCode para um processo que está em execução num computador remoto.

trans-unit.source: This property is available only for processes that are running on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade só está disponível para processos em execução no computador local.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a process exits.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando um processo é terminado.

trans-unit.source: The Exited event indicates that the associated process exited.
trans-unit.target: O evento Exited indica que o processo associado foi terminado.

trans-unit.source: This occurrence means either that the process terminated (aborted) or successfully closed.
trans-unit.target: Esta ocorrência o que significa que o processo terminada (abortada) ou fechado com êxito.

trans-unit.source: This event can occur only if the value of the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.EnableRaisingEvents%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: Este evento pode ocorrer apenas se o valor da <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.EnableRaisingEvents%2A>propriedade é `true`.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.EnableRaisingEvents%2A>

trans-unit.source: There are two ways of being notified when the associated process exits: synchronously and asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: Existem duas formas de que está a ser notificado quando o processo associado termina: forma síncrona e assíncrona.

trans-unit.source: Synchronous notification means calling the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.WaitForExit%2A> method to block the current thread until the process exits.
trans-unit.target: Notificação síncrona significa chamar o <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.WaitForExit%2A>método para bloquear o thread atual até que o processo é terminado.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.WaitForExit%2A>

trans-unit.source: Asynchronous notification uses the Exited event, which allows the calling thread to continue execution in the meantime.
trans-unit.target: Notificação assíncrona utiliza o evento Exited, que permite que o thread de chamada continuar a execução entretanto.

trans-unit.source: In the latter case, <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.EnableRaisingEvents%2A> must be set to `true` for the calling application to receive the Exited event.
trans-unit.target: No caso desta última opção, <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.EnableRaisingEvents%2A>deve ser definido como `true` para a aplicação de chamada receber o evento Exited.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.EnableRaisingEvents%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the operating system shuts down a process, it notifies all other processes that have registered handlers for the Exited event.
trans-unit.target: Quando o sistema operativo será encerrado a um processo, notifica todos os outros processos que registou processadores para o evento Exited.

trans-unit.source: At this time, the handle of the process that just exited can be used to access some properties such as <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.ExitTime%2A> and <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.HasExited%2A> that the operating system maintains until it releases that handle completely.
trans-unit.target: Neste momento, o identificador do processo que saiu apenas pode ser utilizado para aceder a algumas propriedades, tais como <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.ExitTime%2A>e <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.HasExited%2A>que o sistema operativo mantém até que a liberta completamente esse identificador.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.HasExited%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.ExitTime%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Even if you have a handle to an exited process, you cannot call <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Start%2A> again to reconnect to the same process.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] >, Mesmo se tiver um identificador de um processo fechadas, não é possível chamar <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Start%2A>novamente para restabelecer a ligação para o mesmo processo.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Start%2A>

trans-unit.source: Calling <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Start%2A> automatically releases the associated process and connects to a process with the same file but an entirely new <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Handle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Chamar <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Start%2A>automaticamente disponibiliza o processo associado e estabelece ligação a um processo com o mesmo ficheiro, mas um <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Handle%2A>.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Handle%2A> completamente nova</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Start%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about the use of the Exited event in Windows Forms applications, see the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.SynchronizingObject%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a utilização do evento Exited em aplicações do Windows Forms, consulte o <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.SynchronizingObject%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.SynchronizingObject%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets the time that the associated process exited.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a hora de fim do processo associado.

trans-unit.source: If the process has not terminated, attempting to retrieve the ExitTime property throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: Se o processo não foi terminada, tentar obter a propriedade ExitTime emite uma exceção.

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.HasExited%2A> before getting the ExitTime property to determine whether the associated process has terminated.
trans-unit.target: Utilize <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.HasExited%2A>antes de obter a propriedade ExitTime para determinar se o processo associado foi terminada.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.HasExited%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.DateTime> that indicates when the associated process was terminated.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.DateTime>que indica quando o processo associado foi terminado.</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: The platform is Windows 98 or Windows Millennium Edition (Windows Me), which does not support this property.
trans-unit.target: É a plataforma Windows 98 ou Millennium edição do Windows (Windows-Me), que não suporta esta propriedade.

trans-unit.source: You are trying to access the ExitTime property for a process that is running on a remote computer.
trans-unit.target: Está a tentar aceder a propriedade ExitTime para um processo que está em execução num computador remoto.

trans-unit.source: This property is available only for processes that are running on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade só está disponível para processos em execução no computador local.

trans-unit.source: Gets a new <xref href="System.Diagnostics.Process"></xref> component and associates it with the currently active process.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um novo <xref href="System.Diagnostics.Process"> </xref> componente e associa-a com o processo atualmente ativo.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to create a new <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> instance and associate it with the process resource on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: Utilize este método para criar um novo <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>instância e associá-lo com o recurso de processo no computador local.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>

trans-unit.source: Like the similar <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcessById%2A>, <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcessesByName%2A>, and <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcesses%2A> methods, GetCurrentProcess associates an existing resource with a new <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> component.
trans-unit.target: Como o semelhante <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcessById%2A>, <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcessesByName%2A>, e <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcesses%2A>métodos, GetCurrentProcess associa um recurso existente com uma nova <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>componente.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> </xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcesses%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcessesByName%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcessById%2A>

trans-unit.source: A new <xref href="System.Diagnostics.Process"></xref> component associated with the process resource that is running the calling application.
trans-unit.target: Um novo <xref href="System.Diagnostics.Process"> </xref> componente associado ao recurso de processo que está a executar a aplicação de chamada.

trans-unit.source: Returns a new <xref href="System.Diagnostics.Process"></xref> component, given the identifier of a process on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: Devolve um novo <xref href="System.Diagnostics.Process"> </xref> componente, dado o identificador de um processo no computador local.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to create a new <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> component and associate it with a process resource on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: Utilize este método para criar um novo <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>componente e associá-la um recurso de processo no computador local.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>

trans-unit.source: The process resource must already exist on the computer, because GetProcessById does not create a system resource, but rather associates a resource with an application-generated <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process> component.
trans-unit.target: O recurso de processo já deve existir no computador, porque GetProcessById não cria um recurso de sistema, mas em vez disso, associa um recurso com uma aplicação gerados pelo <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>componente.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process>

trans-unit.source: A process <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Id%2A> can be retrieved only for a process that is currently running on the computer.
trans-unit.target: Um processo <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Id%2A>podem ser obtidos apenas para um processo que está atualmente em execução no computador.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Id%2A>

trans-unit.source: After the process terminates, GetProcessById throws an exception if you pass it an expired identifier.
trans-unit.target: Depois do processo termina, o GetProcessById emite uma exceção se obtiver um identificador expirado.

trans-unit.source: On any particular computer, the identifier of a process is unique.
trans-unit.target: Em qualquer computador específico, o identificador de um processo é exclusivo.

trans-unit.source: GetProcessById returns one process at most.
trans-unit.target: GetProcessById devolve um processo no máximo.

trans-unit.source: If you want to get all the processes running a particular application, use <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcessesByName%28System.String%29>.
trans-unit.target: Se pretender obter todos os processos em execução uma aplicação específica, utilize <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcessesByName%28System.String%29>.</xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcessesByName%28System.String%29>

trans-unit.source: If multiple processes exist on the computer running the specified application, <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcessesByName%28System.String%29> returns an array containing all the associated processes.
